DescriptionData.Title: Silly Farm Split Cakes - Hippie (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Hippie Split Cakes have changed the way we face paint. Rainbow cakes are multi-colored cakes of face paint that allow you to lay down several colors at once. Just one stroke with a brush and apply to skin, and you have a rainbow. Rainbow cakes are excellent for base work for any design.
Rainbow cakes are best used with a half sponge, body brushes or "wisp" brushes. Rainbow cakes can also be used with Face Paint Stencils.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 2 ounce Silly Farm Hippie Split Cake is good for 75-200 applications
Hippie Rainbow Cakes include strips of Purples, Hot Pink, Yellow and Lime Green
Allows you to pick up a rainbow of color in one broad stroke
Split cakes are an easy tool to enhance your face painting designs
Excellent for face or full body
